answers.answer: Damn they said that was high? I mean for GD I guess it could be but I'd kill to have that every few months. I'm a type 1 diabetic and it's tough. More often than not before I got pregnant mine was over 12... my last one after I found out I was pregnant back in May I think was 6.8 I was ecstatic. But just watch what you eat and how much. I'm sure they've told you about what you can and can't eat as much. But be glad that gd. Does go away after baby comes. So don't freak yourself out. Just do what's needed to manage it.

question: hi there im 35weeks pregnant and im doin great for the past 7+ months.... i just found out last week that my blood sugar is high... hba1c result is 7.6.... does any of you experience this? im a ftm would appreciate your comments... thanks and goodluck to all of us
title: gestational diabetes GDM
